name: @io-tools/localize
description: Provides information about addressfor any country in the world. Contents of this package will allow you to programatically build address forms that adhere to rules of a particular region or country, validate local addresses and format them to produce a valid address label for delivery.

scripts.build: rimraf lib && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types

author: Evgheni Calcutin <evgheni.calcutin@gmail.com> (https://kalkutin.dev)
